arm_group.description: Non-operative treatment: 6 weeks in a cast, 4 weeks partial weight bearing and last 2 weeks weight bearing as tolerated.
ORIF, after care like in a non-operative treatment group.

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of the study is to find the optimal treatment for ER-Stress positive Weber-B
      unimallaolar ankle fractures.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of Operative Versus Non-operative Treatment of ER-stress Positive Ankle Fractures

detailed_description.textblock:
Prospective randomized controlled comparative study of non-operative vs operative treatment
      of ER-stress positive unimalleolar ankle fractures. The ER-stress test is performed by
      consultant trauma orthopedic surgeon or a trauma resident with trauma service done. Medial
      clear space opening of 5mm or more was considered a positive ER stress test. Those patients
      were randomized either non-operative or operative treatment by opening the sealed envelope.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Weber B unimalleolar ankle fracture

          -  Age: 16 years or older

          -  Voluntary

          -  Operated within 7 days of the trauma

          -  Walking without aid before accident

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Peripheral neuropathy

          -  Pilon fracture

          -  Bilateral ankle fracture

          -  Simultaneous crural fracture

          -  Pathological fracture

          -  Active infection around the ankle

          -  A previous ankle fracture or significant medial ligament trauma

          -  Lives outside our hospital district or a foreigner

          -  Co-operation is insufficient

intervention.description: 6 weeks in a cast. 4 weeks with partial weight bearing and last 2 weeks weight bearing as tolerated.
Open reduction and osteosynthesis with semi-tubular plate and cortical screws.

facility.name: OYS, Oulu university hospital, Department of orthopedic and traumatology

clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective Randomized Study of Operative Versus Non-operative Treatment of ER-stress Positive Weber-B Unimalleolar Fractures.

oversight_info.authority: Finland: Valvira - National Supervisory Authority for Welfare and Health

primary_outcome.description: Fracture healing is monitored in every study visits: 2, 6 and 12 weeks and 2 years after injury.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: A Physiotherapist measure ankle joint dorsal- and plantarflexion.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment
